body_html: Just to clarify, this seems to be a bug in the tf-trt integration, where it include some nodes in the trt subgraph which caused the problem. In general, the integration should not put the node into the segment before the it is confident enough to handle it. This issue will hopefully be fixed by #19871. Meanwhile we're still finding the root cause, so I'm reopening this one.

body: Just to clarify, this seems to be a bug in the tf-trt integration, where it include some nodes in the trt subgraph which caused the problem. In general, the integration should not put the node into the segment before the it is confident enough to handle it. This issue will hopefully be fixed by #19871. Meanwhile we're still finding the root cause, so I'm reopening this one.
